short_description: cobli is a blinds, curtains & draperies supplier based in harelbeke, belgium.
long_description: gegarandeerd de laagste prijzen van de benelux 5 jaar garantie. bij cobli hebben we meer dan 40 jaar ervaring in zonwering en raamdecoratie. we kennen de markt door en door en weten daarom precies wat jij wilt. en daar stemden we onze collecties, met alle soorten raamdecoratie, op af. al onze producten zijn van hoge kwaliteit, op maat gemaakt, tijdloos, trendy en vooral betaalbaar. het online bestellen van raamdecoratie is nog niet zo ingeburgerd.

generated_description: cobli is a company with over 40 years of experience in sun protection and window decoration. they offer a wide range of high-quality and affordable window decorations, including roller blinds, pleated curtains, and pvc blinds. their collections include popular types such as roller blind, double roller blind sets, and pleated blinds in various colors. cobli provides measuring instructions to help customers determine the right window decoration for their specific needs. they also offer a 5-year warranty on all their products. cobly's online ordering process is simple and quick, and they provide free color charts to help determine the perfect color for customers' homes.
